text: Hello, Is there a way to create a column in HubDB that is required so it won't allow updating the db if some data is missing? Thanks!
No, we do not have that feature now.
This needs to go in <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> and a <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas|community idea> <@U01QULE7KT6>
